```php
    <?php foreach ($shows as $show): ?>
      <?php echo Form::open(array('url' => 'show/' . $show->id, 'method' => 'DELETE')) ?>
      <?php echo Form::label('name', 'Show Name: ') . $show->name ?>
      <?php echo Form::submit('Delete') ?>
      <?php echo Form::close() ?>
    <?php endforeach; ?>
    ```
